attributes.additional_details: WE WANT TO SAVE OUR LOCAL PCSO'S IN TILBURY AND SURROUNDING AREAS.  THESE OFFICERS ARE ESSENTIAL TO PREVENT CRIME AND SUPPORT RESIDENTS WITHIN OUR COMMUNITY, KEEPING THEM ON OUR STREETS PROTECTING US.   WE NEED 100,000 SIGNATURES TO ENABLE A DEBATE AT THE HOUSE OF COMMONS.  PLEASE SIGN AND PASS ON, THIS IS FOR OUR PROTECTION, DON'T LOSE IT.

rejection.details: The e-petitions process is designed to allow individuals to raise issues about Government policy. The matter that you have raised is an operational one for your local police force.
